name: Sanitation Superstars
title: Top-notch Sanitation Services
description: In 2022, 100% of both rural and urban populations in Andorra had access to safely managed sanitation services, showcasing the country's commitment to public health and hygiene.

name: Safe Beginnings
title: Lowest Infant and Child Mortality Rates
description: In 2023, Andorra reported only one death each in the age groups 0-1, 1-5, 15-19, and 20-24 years, highlighting its exceptional healthcare system and child safety measures.

name: Golden Age Balance
title: Balanced Female Population in Middle Age
description: In 2023, 9.21% of Andorra's female population was aged 45-49, indicating a balanced demographic structure in the middle-aged female segment.
